title: New: GEMS – Never Age
content:
With their SXSW debut mere days away, Washington D.

C. dream-pop duo GEMS have unveiled the B-side to their 7″ single All I Ever, released via Turntable Kitchen. With Lindsay’s ever perfect vocals and their uncanny knack for finding a killer hook, Never Age is yet another very exciting step for this fledgling band. Also, did we mention that they’ll be opening up our unofficial SXSW day party on Wednesday? RSVP here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
